art.author: james_t_guthridge
art.post: We of so little fate.God said unto theeI love thee, I love but theewith a love that shall not dieTill the moon turns oldTill the stars turn coldTill the leaves in the judgementbook unfold.
art.title: Akiane’s Jesus, Heaven is for Real and the Man in the Turin Shroud

art.author: james_t_guthridge
art.post: Their is no f in my last name, I doubled the keys, Last name Guthridge
